Title: Senza lasciare traccia
Writer: Gianclaudio Cappai (screenplay), Gianclaudio Cappai (story), Lea Tafuri (screenplay), Lea Tafuri (story)
Actors: Michele Riondino, Valentina Cervi, Vitaliano Trevisan, Elena Radonicich
Plot: Bruno has tried to forget, but he still carries the scars of his past, on his skin and under, hidden within the creases of his soul and body, like the illness that consumes him slowly. One ...
